This worked fine on pwsh 6 up until pwsh 7 rc 2 but started failing on rc3. The pwsh process just exits

RC 3
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10071039/75450043-6391de00-596e-11ea-8cba-daf1a4f56ddb.png)

PSv6

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10071039/75450172-9b008a80-596e-11ea-9961-12e034a74a14.png)


# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
$rsa = [System.Security.Cryptography.RSA]::Create(2048)

$dn = [X500DistinguishedName]::new('CN="bogus"')

[System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.CertificateRequest]::new(
  $dn,
  $rsa,
  [System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName]::SHA256,
  [System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding]::Pkcs1
)
```

# Expected behavior

works

# Actual behavior

crashes pwsh process

# Environment data

```none

```

comments.body: Might be the case but why did it work without issue from 6 until 7 rc2? The link to the external issue has not been commented on after October 2019 so how come I had no issues until rc3 (for me it's regression)?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@bgelens PowerShell Core 6.0 is based on .Net Core 2. PowerShell 7.0 is based on .Net Core 3. So I expect it is .Net Core regression.
/cc @SteveL-MSFT for information.

title: [System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.CertificateRequest]::new crashes pwsh 7 rc 3 on mac
